scripts.build-api: npm run clean-dist-api && cd WoWMarketWatcher.API && dotnet publish -c=Debug -o dist
scripts.build-ui: npm run clean-dist-ui && cd WoWMarketWatcher.UI && dotnet publish -c=Debug -o dist
scripts.build-api-prod: npm run clean-dist-api && cd WoWMarketWatcher.API && dotnet publish -c=Release -o dist
scripts.build-ui-prod: npm run clean-dist-ui && cd WoWMarketWatcher.UI && dotnet publish -c=Release -o dist
scripts.restart-digital-ocean-service: ssh root@rwherber.com "sudo systemctl stop WoWMarketWatcher.API.service; sudo systemctl enable WoWMarketWatcher.API.service; sudo systemctl start WoWMarketWatcher.API.service; sudo systemctl daemon-reload"
scripts.deploy-api-to-digital-ocean: npm run clean-digital-ocean && npm run copy-dist-to-digital-ocean && npm run copy-service-file-to-digital-ocean && npm run restart-digital-ocean-service
scripts.deploy-api-to-digital-ocean-docker: ssh root@rwherber.com "docker pull rob893/wow-market-watcher-api:latest; docker stop wow-market-watcher-api-1; docker rm wow-market-watcher-api-1; docker run --restart=always -d --network host --name wow-market-watcher-api-1 -v /var/www/html/APIs/SettingsFiles/WoWMarketWatcher.API/appsettings.Secrets.json:/app/appsettings.Secrets.json rob893/wow-market-watcher-api:latest"
scripts.build-and-deploy-api-to-digital-ocean: npm run build-api-prod && npm run clean-digital-ocean && npm run copy-dist-to-digital-ocean && npm run copy-service-file-to-digital-ocean && npm run restart-digital-ocean-service
